analysis.description:
Contract locking ether found in /unique_chucks/22/0xcdf68b7953ba3934d6c6ea5accfe4b9af30838f3.sol:
	Contract MTCToken has payable functions:
	 - fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0xcdf68b7953ba3934d6c6ea5accfe4b9af30838f3.sol)
	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/22/0xcdf68b7953ba3934d6c6ea5accfe4b9af30838f3.sol:
